name: reekoh

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: riko support
des: This skill allow users to get latest tweets and blog posts from reekoh. It also helps users to send data to the Reekoh Iot Platform using amazon echo.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
